class.name: RealVectorChangingVisitor

javadoc.text: This interface defines a visitor for the entries of a vector. Visitors * implementing this interface may alter the entries of the vector being * visited.
Start visiting a vector. This method is called once, before any entry * of the vector is visited.
javadoc.param: dimension the size of the vector
start the index of the first entry to be visited
end the index of the last entry to be visited (inclusive)

javadoc.text: Visit one entry of the vector.
javadoc.param: index the index of the entry being visited
value the value of the entry being visited
javadoc.return: the new value of the entry being visited

javadoc.text: End visiting a vector. This method is called once, after all entries of * the vector have been visited.

class.comment:
